body_html:
Nikita I'll consider adding control of state in raw_rnn. The interface is
still flexible

On Aug 19, 2016 5:06 PM, "Ashvin Nair" notifications@github.com wrote:

Thanks for the reply @ebrevdo https://github.com/ebrevdo. I hadn't seen
the AttentionCellWrapper before, and thats exactly what the one included
here does so I'll take it out.

—
